file_content.text: Wait! I am not your enemy!
I recognize you from the holos. You're the one in charge of this place.
I am Jarak, a humble servant of the Eternal Throne who merely does what he is told.
At least you understand your purpose.
Others should obey so well.
Vaylin... something went wrong. Her power is racing out of control. When it erupts, the entire asylum will be destroyed.
We can survive this cataclysm, but we need to work together.
You work for Vaylin. Why would you help us?
I don't trust you.
Mutual survival. Vaylin's power has driven the beasts and keepers mad. Protect me from them, and I will guide you to shelter.
Hurry, and stay close. It isn't far.
A justification for evil I've heard far too often.
That's no excuse.
Just tell me what to do.
You've got a deal.
What's going on? Where were you going?
Explain yourself.
Our problem has solved itself. Call Theron to pick us up.
Or we leave Vaylin to die.
Vaylin's power has driven the keepers and beasts mad. I can guide you to safety, but you must protect me along the way.
The pursuit of scientific knowledge is not evil, though there are sometimes unforeseen consequences.
Despite my loyalty to those I serve, my research sometimes has unfortunate side effects.
You'll never get out in time. I know a place we'll be safe. But I can't get there alone.
I need someone to protect me along the way. Vaylin's power has driven the keepers and beasts mad.
This partnership's over the second you make a wrong move.
Fine, but I'm watching you.
Your terms are agreeable.
